meta.title: Bifrost
meta.description: Bifrost developed a Staking Liquidity Protocol called SLP that allows you to get vTokens for operations and delivering liquidity, plus you got staking rewards for your DOT, KSM, EOS or other token that is otherwise locked by the Staking Mechanism.

title: Bifrost
description: Bifrost developed a Staking Liquidity Protocol called SLP that allows you to get vTokens for operations and delivering liquidity, plus you got staking rewards for your DOT, KSM, EOS or other token that is otherwise locked by the Staking Mechanism.
